description.value: You throw a weapon to distract your opponent as you close the gap to begin your assault. You Stride twice; at any point during this movement, you can make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon. If the Strike hits, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] against the next melee attack that you attempt against it before the end of your current turn.
